articles.title: Over 100 Tourists Stuck At Agatha Christie's Old UK Home For Several Hours. Here's Why - NDTV
articles.description: Several internet users couldn't help but compare the situation to Ms Christie's classic book 'And Then There Were None'.
articles.content:
Many visitors kept themselves busy by drinking cups of tea in the tearoom.
More than 100 tourists were stuck for several hours at Greenway, the old residence of renowned British mystery author Agath… [+1867 chars]
